name: Banana Pudding - Aunt Sis
author: Becky Collier
instructions: Mix together cream cheese & condensed milk. In separate bowl, mix vanilla pudding with 3 cups milk until it starts setting. Add 8 oz, whipped topping & blend. Add this mixture to the cream cheese mixture & mix. Layer in 9x13pan, pudding sliced banane, crushed vanilla wafers, pudding, and crushed vanilla wafer on top. Chill.
